As a Python Developer, your primary duty involves conducting comprehensive code reviews and providing actionable feedback alongside documentation. Collaboration with researchers and other stakeholders is crucial to maintain project alignment.
Job Responsibilities:
Develop efficient Python code solutions to address a variety of problems effectively.
Apply business acumen and analytical skills to extract meaningful insights from diverse public databases.
Articulate reasoning and logic clearly when coding in platforms like Jupyter notebooks.
Collaborate closely with researchers to exchange valuable insights and ideas.
Maintain detailed documentation for all developed code.
Utilize data analysis expertise to formulate responses to significant business inquiries using datasets from various sources, including Kaggle, the UN, and the US government.
Job Requirements:
Open to applicants of all levels, from junior to seasoned industry professionals.
Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Computer Science, or equivalent practical experience.
Proficiency in Python programming language for coding and debugging.
Ability to handle intermediate-level Python coding tasks and grasp algorithmic concepts.
Strong problem-solving skills, complemented by exceptional reasoning and mathematical abilities.
Proficient in English with excellent communication skills for effective team collaboration.
Perks:
Collaborate with renowned experts around the world and build connections to fuel your career aspirations.
Embrace the flexibility of remote employment, breaking free from conventional office routines.
Receive a competitive salary in USD, meeting global benchmarks.
Play a pivotal role in pioneering projects that redefine technological horizons, accelerating your career progression.

A renowned US-based client seeks Python Developer.

As a Python Developer, your primary duty involves conducting comprehensive code reviews and providing actionable feedback alongside documentation. Collaboration with researchers and other stakeholders is crucial to maintain project alignment.

Job Responsibilities:

  • Develop efficient Python code solutions to address a variety of problems effectively.
  • Apply business acumen and analytical skills to extract meaningful insights from diverse public databases.
  • Articulate reasoning and logic clearly when coding in platforms like Jupyter notebooks.
  • Collaborate closely with researchers to exchange valuable insights and ideas.
  • Maintain detailed documentation for all developed code.
  • Utilize data analysis expertise to formulate responses to significant business inquiries using datasets from various sources, including Kaggle, the UN, and the US government.

Job Requirements:

  • Open to applicants of all levels, from junior to seasoned industry professionals.
  • Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Computer Science, or equivalent practical experience.
  • Proficiency in Python programming language for coding and debugging.
  • Ability to handle intermediate-level Python coding tasks and grasp algorithmic concepts.
  • Strong problem-solving skills, complemented by exceptional reasoning and mathematical abilities.
  • Proficient in English with excellent communication skills for effective team collaboration.

Perks:

  • Collaborate with renowned experts around the world and build connections to fuel your career aspirations.
  • Embrace the flexibility of remote employment, breaking free from conventional office routines.
  • Receive a competitive salary in USD, meeting global benchmarks.
  • Play a pivotal role in pioneering projects that redefine technological horizons, accelerating your career progression.

Ready to advance your career? Dive into our tests and MCQs now to enhance your chances of securing one of our dynamic roles in the tech industry. Don't miss out on this opportunity to play a pivotal role in our mission and reshape the tech landscape for all.

Environmental Conditions
Office

We are seeking a highly skilled and expert Data Scientist to join our team. In this role you will be collecting, analyzing, and interpreting large sets of data to identify trends, patterns, and insights relevant to strategic decision-making. You will also develop and implement advanced statistical models and algorithms to analyze data and tackle business problems. Effective communication of findings and insights derived from data analysis to partners using clear, concise visualizations and reports. Additionally, you will collaborate with interdisciplinary teams to find opportunities for improvement, develop innovative solutions, and implement data-driven strategies.
Responsibilities:
Collect, analyze, and interpret large sets of data to identify trends, patterns, and insights relevant to strategic decision-making.
Develop and implement statistical models and algorithms to analyze data and tackle business problems.
Effectively communicate findings and insights derived from data analysis to partners using clear, concise visualizations and reports.
Collaborate with interdisciplinary teams to find opportunities for improvement, develop innovative solutions, and implement data-driven strategies.
Skills:
Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, R, or SQL for data manipulation and analysis.
Knowledge of statistics, statistical modeling, and data analysis techniques.
Experience using data visualization tools such as Tableau or Power BI to build interactive visualizations and actionable insights.
Ability to work with large volumes of data and use data mining, machine learning, and artificial intelligence techniques to extract relevant information.
Qualifications:
Confirmed experience in data analysis, statistical modeling, and machine learning.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with a keen attention to detail.
Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to optimally convey sophisticated concepts to both technical and non-technical partners.
Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced, team-oriented environment.

We are seeking a highly skilled and expert Data Scientist to join our team. In this role you will be collecting, analyzing, and interpreting large sets of data to identify trends, patterns, and insights relevant to strategic decision-making. You will also develop and implement advanced statistical models and algorithms to analyze data and tackle business problems. Effective communication of findings and insights derived from data analysis to partners using clear, concise visualizations and reports. Additionally, you will collaborate with interdisciplinary teams to find opportunities for improvement, develop innovative solutions, and implement data-driven strategies.

Responsibilities:

  • Collect, analyze, and interpret large sets of data to identify trends, patterns, and insights relevant to strategic decision-making.
  • Develop and implement statistical models and algorithms to analyze data and tackle business problems.
  • Effectively communicate findings and insights derived from data analysis to partners using clear, concise visualizations and reports.
  • Collaborate with interdisciplinary teams to find opportunities for improvement, develop innovative solutions, and implement data-driven strategies.

Skills:

  • Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, R, or SQL for data manipulation and analysis.
  • Knowledge of statistics, statistical modeling, and data analysis techniques.
  • Experience using data visualization tools such as Tableau or Power BI to build interactive visualizations and actionable insights.
  • Ability to work with large volumes of data and use data mining, machine learning, and artificial intelligence techniques to extract relevant information.

Qualifications:

  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with a keen attention to detail.
  • Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to optimally convey sophisticated concepts to both technical and non-technical partners.
  • Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced, team-oriented environment.

Ability to start in 2024.
About The Job

Google's software engineers develop the next-generation technologies that change how billions of users connect, explore, and interact with information and one another. Our products need to handle information at massive scale, and extend well beyond web search. We're looking for engineers who bring fresh ideas from all areas, including information retrieval, distributed computing, large-scale system design, networking and data storage, security, artificial intelligence, natural language processing, UI design and mobile
column2: the list goes on and is growing every day. As a software engineer, you will work on a specific project critical to Googleâ€™s needs with opportunities to switch teams and projects as you and our fast-paced business grow and evolve. We need our engineers to be versatile, display leadership qualities and be enthusiastic to take on new problems across the full-stack as we continue to push technology forward.

column1: With your technical expertise you will manage project priorities, deadlines, and deliverables. You will design, develop, test, deploy, maintain, and enhance software solutions.

Google is an engineering company at heart. We hire people with a broad set of technical skills who are ready to take on some of technology's greatest challenges and make an impact on users around the world. At Google, engineers not only revolutionize search, they routinely work on scalability and storage solutions, large-scale applications and entirely new platforms for developers around the world. From Google Ads to Chrome, Android to YouTube, social to local, Google engineers are changing the world one technological achievement after another.
Responsibilities
Write product or system development code.
Participate in, or lead design reviews with peers and stakeholders to decide amongst available technologies.
Review code developed by other developers and provide feedback to ensure best practices (e.g., style guidelines, checking code in, accuracy, testability, and efficiency).
Contribute to existing documentation or educational content and adapt content based on product/program updates and user feedback.
Triage product or system issues and debug/track/resolve by analyzing the sources of issues and the impact on hardware, network, or service operations and quality.

Google is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. See also Google's EEO Policy and EEO is the Law. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing our Accommodations for Applicants form .

Apply data analysis skills to address critical business queries using diverse datasets, including those sourced from Kaggle, the UN, and government sources.
Your Qualifications:

4021922226,https://br.linkedin.com/jobs/view/data-scientist-at-sumup-4021922226?position=45&pageNum=0&refId=OcPYtfz5FE9rHUeuAxtJYg%3D%3D&trackingId=4myy4%2FnJvfFds%2B7TojRe4A%3D%3D&trk=public_jobs_jserp-result_search-card,Data Scientist,SumUp,"SÃ£o Paulo, SÃ£o Paulo, Brazil","As a data scientist part of a Fraud Prevention cross-functional team, you will be responsible for developing, deploying, and maintaining models to detect fraud in card-present and banking transactions across various markets. Daily tasks include monitoring and evaluating the performance of existing models, collaborating with strategy stakeholders to develop risk policies, and conducting feature engineering to identify and adapt to new fraud patterns.
Your routine will include
Developing and maintaining fraud detection models using machine learning techniques
Monitoring, evaluating, and enhancing the performance of fraud models in production
Collaborating with cross-functional teams, including risk management, product, and operations, to design and refine risk policies
Performing extensive feature engineering to adapt to emerging fraud trends and market conditions
Continuously improving data pipelines, ensuring reliable and scalable solutions
Providing insights and recommendations to support fraud prevention strategies
You will be great for this role if you have

About SumUp
Be empowered to do more that matters.

At SumUp, we're on a mission to empower small businesses across the globe by providing simple and affordable tools that allow them to thrive. Today, over 4 million businesses in 36 markets rely on SumUp as their financial partner to manage payments, finance, and customer relationships.

Our commitment to small businesses is reflected in our diverse team of over 3,000 SumUppers from over 90 nationalities, united by global collaboration and an innovative mindset. Our core values lay the foundation for who we are and what we stand for, shaping our work culture and driving our success. We foster inclusivity and a continuous learning culture, providing a safe space for personal and professional growth. Our differences make us unique and strong as we strive to create an environment where everyone belongs and feels supported, no matter how they identify.

As a data scientist part of a Fraud Prevention cross-functional team, you will be responsible for developing, deploying, and maintaining models to detect fraud in card-present and banking transactions across various markets. Daily tasks include monitoring and evaluating the performance of existing models, collaborating with strategy stakeholders to develop risk policies, and conducting feature engineering to identify and adapt to new fraud patterns.

Your routine will include

  • Developing and maintaining fraud detection models using machine learning techniques
  • Monitoring, evaluating, and enhancing the performance of fraud models in production
  • Collaborating with cross-functional teams, including risk management, product, and operations, to design and refine risk policies
  • Performing extensive feature engineering to adapt to emerging fraud trends and market conditions
  • Continuously improving data pipelines, ensuring reliable and scalable solutions
  • Providing insights and recommendations to support fraud prevention strategies

You will be great for this role if you have

  • Utilize data analysis expertise to address significant business inquiries using various datasets, including those from Kaggle, the UN, and the US government.

  • Open to applicants of all levels, from junior to industry experts.
  • Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Computer Science, or equivalent practical experience.
  • Proficient in the Python programming language for coding and debugging purposes.
  • Ability to handle intermediate-level Python coding tasks and grasp algorithmic concepts.
  • Excellent problem-solving skills, combined with exceptional reasoning and mathematical abilities.
  • Proficient in English with excellent communication skills to promote effective team collaboration.

Perks:

  • Partner with leading industry authorities across the globe and foster connections to elevate your career goals.
  • Embrace the versatility of remote working arrangements, departing from traditional office settings.
  • Enjoy a competitive salary package in USD, aligned with global remuneration standards.
  • Contribute to revolutionary endeavors that challenge technological norms, catalyzing your career advancement.

Note: By applying to this position you will have an opportunity to share your preferred working location from the following: Belo Horizonte, State of Minas Gerais, Brazil
column2: SÃ£o Paulo, State of SÃ£o Paulo, Brazil.Minimum qualifications:

column1: Bachelorâ€™s degree or equivalent practical experience.
1 year of experience with software development in one or more programming languages (e.g., Python, C, C++, Java, JavaScript).
Preferred qualifications:
Master's degree or PhD in Computer Science, or a related technical field.
Experience developing accessible technologies.
Ability to start in 2024.
About The Job

Google's software engineers develop the next-generation technologies that change how billions of users connect, explore, and interact with information and one another. Our products need to handle information at massive scale, and extend well beyond web search. We're looking for engineers who bring fresh ideas from all areas, including information retrieval, distributed computing, large-scale system design, networking and data storage, security, artificial intelligence, natural language processing, UI design and mobile
column2: the list goes on and is growing every day. As a software engineer, you will work on a specific project critical to Googleâ€™s needs with opportunities to switch teams and projects as you and our fast-paced business grow and evolve. We need our engineers to be versatile, display leadership qualities and be enthusiastic to take on new problems across the full-stack as we continue to push technology forward.

column1: With your technical expertise you will manage project priorities, deadlines, and deliverables. You will design, develop, test, deploy, maintain, and enhance software solutions.

Google is an engineering company at heart. We hire people with a broad set of technical skills who are ready to take on some of technology's greatest challenges and make an impact on users around the world. At Google, engineers not only revolutionize search, they routinely work on scalability and storage solutions, large-scale applications and entirely new platforms for developers around the world. From Google Ads to Chrome, Android to YouTube, social to local, Google engineers are changing the world one technological achievement after another.
Responsibilities
Write product or system development code.
Participate in, or lead design reviews with peers and stakeholders to decide amongst available technologies.
Review code developed by other developers and provide feedback to ensure best practices (e.g., style guidelines, checking code in, accuracy, testability, and efficiency).
Contribute to existing documentation or educational content and adapt content based on product/program updates and user feedback.
Triage product or system issues and debug/track/resolve by analyzing the sources of issues and the impact on hardware, network, or service operations and quality.

Google is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. See also Google's EEO Policy and EEO is the Law. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing our Accommodations for Applicants form .

4027551637,https://it.linkedin.com/jobs/view/data-scientist-at-world-food-programme-4027551637?position=3&pageNum=0&refId=6VwybPj3KxlwPhEdg0E3FQ%3D%3D&trackingId=UDVhRs9Tp39RpSTeqlZ5rQ%3D%3D&trk=public_jobs_jserp-result_search-card,Data Scientist,World Food Programme,"Rome, Latium, Italy","DEADLINE FOR APPLICATIONS
1 October 2024-23:59-GMT+01:00 Central European Time (Rome)

WFP celebrates and embraces diversity. It is committed to the principle of equal employment opportunity for all its employees and encourages qualified candidates to apply irrespective of race, colour, national origin, ethnic or social background, genetic information, gender, gender identity and/or expression, sexual orientation, religion or belief, HIV status or disability.
About Wfp

The World Food Programme is the worldâ€™s largest humanitarian organization saving lives in emergencies and using food assistance to build a pathway to peace, stability and prosperity, for people recovering from conflict, disasters and the impact of climate change.

At WFP, people are at the heart of everything we do and the vision of the future WFP workforce is one of diverse, committed, skilled, and high performing teams, selected on merit, operating in a healthy and inclusive work environment, living WFP's values (Integrity, Collaboration, Commitment, Humanity, and Inclusion) and working with partners to save and change the lives of those WFP serves.
To learn more about WFP, visit our website: https://www.wfp.org and follow us on social media to keep up with our latest news: YouTube, LinkedIn, Instagram, Facebook, Twitter.
WHY JOIN WFP?
WFP is a 2020 Nobel Peace Prize Laureate.
WFP offers a highly inclusive, diverse, and multicultural working environment.

WFP invests in the personal & professional development of its employees through a range of training, accreditation, coaching, mentorship, and other programs as well as through internal mobility opportunities.

A career path in WFP provides an exciting opportunity to work across the various country, regional and global offices around the world, and with passionate colleagues who work tirelessly to ensure that effective humanitarian assistance reaches millions of people across the globe.
We offer an attractive compensation package (please refer to the Terms and Conditions section of this vacancy announcement).
Background And Purpose Of The Assignment

The Data Science team within the Forecasting & Early Warning Unit, in the Analysis Planning and Performance (APP) division, is a specialized team dedicated to addressing the challenge of modelling and forecasting food insecurity and its drivers, through the innovative application of AI and data science techniques. By leveraging large heterogenous datasets and advanced algorithms, the team can identify patterns and trends that are not immediately apparent and predict the impact of impending natural and human generated hazards, enabling timely interventions and anticipatory actions in vulnerable areas. The work is crucial in facilitating data-driven decision-making for governments and humanitarian organizations, allowing proactive strategies in combating food crises and their underlying causes. This approach helps to mitigate the impact of potential crises on affected populations, improving resilience and ensuring food security.

The Early Warning and Forecasting Unit is developing an early warning tool to detect impending food crises, with initial pilots in high-priority countries. Working with the private sector, this project will harnesses expertise in artificial intelligence and product innovation alongside WFP's operational insights and localized data. The objective is to generate early warning signals that facilitate proactive interventions, integrating real-time data, satellite imagery, news data streams, and Google analytics to enhance response capabilities and improve the efficiency and effectiveness of efforts to prevent food crises in vulnerable communities. As part of the team, the Data Scientist will be responsible of designing and developing advanced AI solutions to analyze trends and forecast potential crises, producing early warning signals. The models will be developed in production-ready code to ensure smooth maintenance and deployment. The role will also require to collaborate closely with stakeholders to tailor the tool specifically to the needs and conditions of the target regions, ensuring its effectiveness and relevance.
Accountabilities/Responsibilities
The Consultant will be responsible for the following activities:
Research, design and implement AI models for estimating food insecurity and produce early warning of impending crises.
Support ad-hoc data explorations and analysis for the project, by means of traditional statistical analysis as well as state-of-the-art data science methodologies.
In collaboration with the software engineering team, support the design and the implementation of production-ready data pipelines.
Support the writing of technical papers and reports to be submitted to peer-reviewed international journals.
Participate in workshops, meetings and conferences to present the technical aspects of the project, within the organization and externally.
Ensure adherence to WFP policies regarding data, including data privacy, security, management, and code documentation.
Participate in field missions to WFP country offices as required.
Perform other tasks as required.
Deliverables At The End Of The Contract
Technical inputs to the development of Early Warning System, including the code and methodology for generation of the signals.
Deployment of AI models in a production environment
Maintenance of the code base following industryâ€™s best practices.
Submission of research papers to high impact journals.
Participation in project meetings, scientific committee meetings and dissemination events
Presentations on the technical aspects of the project, as needed.
Education
QUALIFICATIONS & EXPERIENCE REQUIRED:
Masterâ€™s degree in engineering, computer science, physics, mathematics or similar.
Experience
At least 5 years of professional experience in a data science-related role, including PhDs and other academic positions.
Knowledge & Skills
Python programming skills and experience with data science libraries (pandas, NumPy, scikit-learn, Keras, etc)
Advanced knowledge of statistics and passion for machine learning with an understanding of algorithms
Experience in deploying and maintaining AI solution in Cloud Environments
Experience in querying SQL databases is required
Experience in git is required
Experience in the following fields is an asset: forecasting Time Series
column2: NLP
column3: Generative AI
column4: Deep Learning Libraries (PyTorch, TensorFlow)

column1: Knowledge of survey methodologies is an asset
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to work effectively and respectfully in a diverse and multicultural team environment
Languages
Excellent spoken and written English. French or Arabic is an asset.
WFP LEADERSHIP FRAMEWORK
WFP Leadership Framework guides to the common standards of behavior that guide HOW we work together to accomplish our mission.
Click here to access WFP Leadership Framework
REASONABLE ACCOMMODATION

WFP is dedicated to fostering diversity, equity, and inclusion. Our recruitment process is inclusively crafted to welcome candidates of all backgrounds, celebrating diversity and ensuring a respectful environment for all. We aim for an accessible and fair recruitment journey. Should you need any reasonable accommodations or have accessibility concerns, please reach out to us confidentially at global.inclusion@wfp.org. Our DEI team is here to ensure your full participation in our recruitment process.
NO FEE DISCLAIMER

The United Nations does not charge any application, processing, training, interviewing, testing or other fee in connection with the application or recruitment process. Should you receive a solicitation for the payment of a fee, please disregard it. Furthermore, please note that emblems, logos, names and addresses are easily copied and reproduced. Therefore, you are advised to apply particular care when submitting personal information on the web.
REMINDERS BEFORE YOU SUBMIT YOUR APPLICATION
We strongly recommend that your profile is accurate, complete, and includes your employment records, academic qualifications, language skills and UN Grade (if applicable).
Once your profile is completed, please apply, and submit your application.
Please make sure you upload your professional CV in the English language
Kindly note the only documents you will need to submit at this time are your CV and Cover Letter
Additional documents such as passport, recommendation letters, academic certificates, etc. may potentially be requested at a future time
Please contact us at global.hrerecruitment@wfp.org in case you face any challenges with submitting your application
Only shortlisted candidates will be notified

All employment decisions are made on the basis of organizational needs, job requirements, merit, and individual qualifications. WFP is committed to providing an inclusive work environment free of sexual exploitation and abuse, all forms of discrimination, any kind of harassment, sexual harassment, and abuse of authority. Therefore, all selected candidates will undergo rigorous reference and background checks.

No appointment under any kind of contract will be offered to members of the UN Advisory Committee on Administrative and Budgetary Questions (ACABQ), International Civil Service Commission (ICSC), FAO Finance Committee, WFP External Auditor, WFP Audit Committee, Joint Inspection Unit (JIU) and other similar bodies within the United Nations system with oversight responsibilities over WFP, both during their service and within three years of ceasing that service.

relative overflow-hidden"">

DEADLINE FOR APPLICATIONS

1 October 2024-23:59-GMT+01:00 Central European Time (Rome)

WFP celebrates and embraces diversity. It is committed to the principle of equal employment opportunity for all its employees and encourages qualified candidates to apply irrespective of race, colour, national origin, ethnic or social background, genetic information, gender, gender identity and/or expression, sexual orientation, religion or belief, HIV status or disability.

About Wfp

The World Food Programme is the worldâ€™s largest humanitarian organization saving lives in emergencies and using food assistance to build a pathway to peace, stability and prosperity, for people recovering from conflict, disasters and the impact of climate change.

At WFP, people are at the heart of everything we do and the vision of the future WFP workforce is one of diverse, committed, skilled, and high performing teams, selected on merit, operating in a healthy and inclusive work environment, living WFP's values (Integrity, Collaboration, Commitment, Humanity, and Inclusion) and working with partners to save and change the lives of those WFP serves.

To learn more about WFP, visit our website: https://www.wfp.org and follow us on social media to keep up with our latest news: YouTube, LinkedIn, Instagram, Facebook, Twitter.

WHY JOIN WFP?

  • WFP is a 2020 Nobel Peace Prize Laureate.
  • WFP offers a highly inclusive, diverse, and multicultural working environment.
  • WFP invests in the personal &
column2:
professional development of its employees through a range of training, accreditation, coaching, mentorship, and other programs as well as through internal mobility opportunities.
  • A career path in WFP provides an exciting opportunity to work across the various country, regional and global offices around the world, and with passionate colleagues who work tirelessly to ensure that effective humanitarian assistance reaches millions of people across the globe.
  • We offer an attractive compensation package (please refer to the Terms and Conditions section of this vacancy announcement).

    • Background And Purpose Of The Assignment

    The Data Science team within the Forecasting &
column3:
Early Warning Unit, in the Analysis Planning and Performance (APP) division, is a specialized team dedicated to addressing the challenge of modelling and forecasting food insecurity and its drivers, through the innovative application of AI and data science techniques. By leveraging large heterogenous datasets and advanced algorithms, the team can identify patterns and trends that are not immediately apparent and predict the impact of impending natural and human generated hazards, enabling timely interventions and anticipatory actions in vulnerable areas. The work is crucial in facilitating data-driven decision-making for governments and humanitarian organizations, allowing proactive strategies in combating food crises and their underlying causes. This approach helps to mitigate the impact of potential crises on affected populations, improving resilience and ensuring food security.

The Early Warning and Forecasting Unit is developing an early warning tool to detect impending food crises, with initial pilots in high-priority countries. Working with the private sector, this project will harnesses expertise in artificial intelligence and product innovation alongside WFP's operational insights and localized data. The objective is to generate early warning signals that facilitate proactive interventions, integrating real-time data, satellite imagery, news data streams, and Google analytics to enhance response capabilities and improve the efficiency and effectiveness of efforts to prevent food crises in vulnerable communities. As part of the team, the Data Scientist will be responsible of designing and developing advanced AI solutions to analyze trends and forecast potential crises, producing early warning signals. The models will be developed in production-ready code to ensure smooth maintenance and deployment. The role will also require to collaborate closely with stakeholders to tailor the tool specifically to the needs and conditions of the target regions, ensuring its effectiveness and relevance.

Accountabilities/Responsibilities

The Consultant will be responsible for the following activities:

  • Research, design and implement AI models for estimating food insecurity and produce early warning of impending crises.
  • Support ad-hoc data explorations and analysis for the project, by means of traditional statistical analysis as well as state-of-the-art data science methodologies.
  • In collaboration with the software engineering team, support the design and the implementation of production-ready data pipelines.
  • Support the writing of technical papers and reports to be submitted to peer-reviewed international journals.
  • Participate in workshops, meetings and conferences to present the technical aspects of the project, within the organization and externally.
  • Ensure adherence to WFP policies regarding data, including data privacy, security, management, and code documentation.
  • Participate in field missions to WFP country offices as required.
  • Perform other tasks as required.

Deliverables At The End Of The Contract

  • Technical inputs to the development of Early Warning System, including the code and methodology for generation of the signals.
  • Deployment of AI models in a production environment
  • Maintenance of the code base following industryâ€™s best practices.
  • Submission of research papers to high impact journals.
  • Participation in project meetings, scientific committee meetings and dissemination events
  • Presentations on the technical aspects of the project, as needed.

Education

QUALIFICATIONS &
column4:
EXPERIENCE REQUIRED:

Masterâ€™s degree in engineering, computer science, physics, mathematics or similar.

Experience

At least 5 years of professional experience in a data science-related role, including PhDs and other academic positions.

Knowledge &
column5:
Skills

  • Python programming skills and experience with data science libraries (pandas, NumPy, scikit-learn, Keras, etc)
  • Advanced knowledge of statistics and passion for machine learning with an understanding of algorithms
  • Experience in deploying and maintaining AI solution in Cloud Environments
  • Experience in querying SQL databases is required
  • Experience in git is required
  • Experience in the following fields is an asset: forecasting Time Series
column6: NLP
column7: Generative AI
column8:
Deep Learning Libraries (PyTorch, TensorFlow)
  • Knowledge of survey methodologies is an asset
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to work effectively and respectfully in a diverse and multicultural team environment

    • Languages

    Excellent spoken and written English. French or Arabic is an asset.

    WFP is dedicated to fostering diversity, equity, and inclusion. Our recruitment process is inclusively crafted to welcome candidates of all backgrounds, celebrating diversity and ensuring a respectful environment for all. We aim for an accessible and fair recruitment journey. Should you need any reasonable accommodations or have accessibility concerns, please reach out to us confidentially at global.inclusion@wfp.org. Our DEI team is here to ensure your full participation in our recruitment process.

    NO FEE DISCLAIMER

    The United Nations does not charge any application, processing, training, interviewing, testing or other fee in connection with the application or recruitment process. Should you receive a solicitation for the payment of a fee, please disregard it. Furthermore, please note that emblems, logos, names and addresses are easily copied and reproduced. Therefore, you are advised to apply particular care when submitting personal information on the web.

    REMINDERS BEFORE YOU SUBMIT YOUR APPLICATION

    • We strongly recommend that your profile is accurate, complete, and includes your employment records, academic qualifications, language skills and UN Grade (if applicable).
    • Once your profile is completed, please apply, and submit your application.
    • Please make sure you upload your professional CV in the English language
    • Kindly note the only documents you will need to submit at this time are your CV and Cover Letter
    • Additional documents such as passport, recommendation letters, academic certificates, etc. may potentially be requested at a future time
    • Please contact us at global.hrerecruitment@wfp.org in case you face any challenges with submitting your application

4023614210,https://it.linkedin.com/jobs/view/data-scientist-at-iconsulting-4023614210?position=7&pageNum=0&refId=6VwybPj3KxlwPhEdg0E3FQ%3D%3D&trackingId=B%2BZM%2FIjxZXzmufnAi4cwnw%3D%3D&trk=public_jobs_jserp-result_search-card,Data Scientist,ICONSULTING,"Rome, Latium, Italy","Siamo una Data Driven Transformation Company specializzata in design e delivery di soluzioni, metodologie, algoritmi e tecnologie capaci di trasformare e potenziare le aziende clienti con la valorizzazione del principale e piÃ¹ abbondante asset del mercato odierno: i dati.

Abbiamo allâ€™attivo piÃ¹ di 1.500 progetti di successo realizzati in oltre 20 anni di crescita costante e continua.

Posizione:

Siamo alla ricerca di un Data Scientist appassionato di machine learning, modelli analitici e intelligenza artificiale. La risorsa che cerchiamo avrÃ  maturato almeno 4 anni di esperienza nel campo dellâ€™analisi e modellazione dei dati, presso primarie realtÃ  consulenziali o di industry.
In particolare, si occuperÃ  di:
Progettazione e sviluppo di soluzioni di Machine Learning e analisi dati per i clienti

Utilizzo di strumenti e linguaggi per la manipolazione dei dati
Proporre soluzioni innovative in ambito analytics
Progettare e implementare data pipelines per integrare dati eterogenei in unâ€™unica piattaforma
Sviluppo di modelli predittivi tramite tecniche di Machine Learning e/o Deep Learning
Gestione end to end di progetti analitici: dallâ€™esigenza di business alla comunicazione efficace dei risultati di analisi
Creazione di dashboard e insight per semplificare il processo decisionale degli stakeholder.

Laurea magistrale STEM (Informatica, Ingegneria Informatica, Statistica, Matematica o affini), costituisce titolo preferenziale il possesso di un PhD

Il nostro team di Artificial Intelligence Engineering si impegna a supportare i clienti nel percorso di adozione dellâ€™intelligenza artificiale attraverso la realizzazione di factory di soluzioni di AI, azionabili e integrate nell'architettura e nei processi aziendali.

Lâ€™AI Engineer lavora a stretto contatto con altre figure di Bip xTech, come Cloud Data Architects, Data Scientists e Data Engineer, per realizzare soluzioni ML di alta qualitÃ  sotto ogni aspetto: disegnando e implementando per il team strumenti di lavoro come le piattaforme di MLOps, fornendo linee guida e best practice sulle architetture dati e di AI, supportando lâ€™implementazione del software e funzionalitÃ  di osservabilitÃ  dellâ€™AI, e altro ancora.
Lâ€™AI Engineer inoltre contribuirÃ  alla Bip xTech Data Community con attivitÃ  di ricerca, scouting tecnologico, concept di nuove soluzioni e sviluppo del business sui clienti di BIP.
Le posizioni aperte riguardano profili sia junior che senior.
Sarai tu a entrare nel nostro team?
Â Requisiti fondamentali
Laurea specialistica in Ingegneria Informatica, Data Science, Informatica o discipline affini (STEM).
Esperienza nello sviluppo di software in almeno un linguaggio, come per esempio: Python, Scala, Java, e/o simili

People atÂ theÂ center of our culture

Challenge yourself

Troverai una policy che supporta lo smartworking fino al 100% del proprio tempo e favorisce il work-life integration.
Diversity, Equity & Inclusion
Valorizziamo lâ€™unicitÃ  e ci impegniamo a garantire che tutti abbiano pari opportunitÃ  di dare un contributo ed esprimere al massimo il potenziale nell'ambiente di lavoro.

Il nostro approccio alla diversitÃ  e allâ€™inclusione si fonda sui principi di etica e integritÃ  e rappresenta il fattore determinante per lo sviluppo di orizzonti, di crescita personale e aziendale, piÃ¹ ampi.
Promuoviamo lâ€™inserimento e lâ€™integrazione lavorativa delle persone appartenenti alle categorie protette â€“ in base a quanto disciplinato dalla legge 68/99 â€“.
Next Steps
Una volta ricevuto il tuo cv ci prenderemo del tempo per valutarlo attentamente.

Lâ€™ordine e il numero delle interviste potrebbero variare a seconda delle esigenze di recruiting.

Entra nel nostro mondo.

AI ENGINEER

Quale sarÃ  la tua sfida?

Il nostro team di Artificial Intelligence Engineering si impegna a supportare i clienti nel percorso di adozione dellâ€™intelligenza artificiale attraverso la realizzazione di factory di soluzioni di AI, azionabili e integrate nell'architettura e nei processi aziendali.

La figura dellâ€™AI Engineer progetta soluzioni software di Machine Learning (ML) scalabili per i casi d'uso dei clienti e le industrializza per lâ€™esecuzione in produzione garantendo i livelli richiesti di performance, sicurezza e governabilitÃ .

Lâ€™AI Engineer lavora a stretto contatto con altre figure di Bip xTech, come Cloud Data Architects, Data Scientists e Data Engineer, per realizzare soluzioni ML di alta qualitÃ  sotto ogni aspetto: disegnando e implementando per il team strumenti di lavoro come le piattaforme di MLOps, fornendo linee guida e best practice sulle architetture dati e di AI, supportando lâ€™implementazione del software e funzionalitÃ  di osservabilitÃ  dellâ€™AI, e altro ancora.

Lâ€™AI Engineer inoltre contribuirÃ  alla Bip xTech Data Community con attivitÃ  di ricerca, scouting tecnologico, concept di nuove soluzioni e sviluppo del business sui clienti di BIP.

Le posizioni aperte riguardano profili sia junior che senior.

Sarai tu a entrare nel nostro team?

esperienza nellâ€™utilizzo di linguaggi SQL per le attivitÃ  di ETL.

Challenge yourself

Avrai la possibilitÃ  di metterti alla prova in contesti progettuali diversi in termini di ambito, natura delle attivitÃ  e stakeholders coinvolti. Vedrai valorizzato il tuo spirito di iniziativa, la tua passione, lâ€™autonomia e la capacitÃ  di assumerti responsabilitÃ  e metterti in gioco.

Unlocking your potential

Diversity, Equity &
column12:

3989112570,https://it.linkedin.com/jobs/view/machine-learning-engineer-at-translated-3989112570?position=15&pageNum=0&refId=6VwybPj3KxlwPhEdg0E3FQ%3D%3D&trackingId=b7pdo%2FjtGWTBhi7qD0HHBw%3D%3D&trk=public_jobs_jserp-result_search-card,Machine Learning Engineer,Translated,Greater Rome Metropolitan Area,"About Translated
Translated is a leading company in AI-enabled translation services. We are on a mission to allow everyone to understand and be understood in their own language.

Our success stems from a unique blend of the worldâ€™s #1 adaptive neural machine translation technology (IDC MarketScape 2022), the largest network of vetted, native-speaking professional translators, and top-ranked AI-enabled text, audio, and video translation tools (Gartner, 2022).

By leveraging a seamless symbiosis of artificial intelligence and human creativity, we design custom localization projects that were previously unthinkable, helping more than 280,000 clients grow their businesses worldwide.

Weâ€™re looking for a passionate Machine Learning Engineer to join the Translated Data Science and AI Production team in our HQ in Pi Campus, Rome. The persona will be responsible for building and maintaining the Machine Learning and AI services of the company.
Key responsabilities
Lead the development of Machine Learning services
Build and maintain CI/CD pipelines
Improve and maintain our GPU cluster
Improve and maintain our API ecosystem
Optimize and put in production Machine Learning models
Collaborate with other team members on internal and external models
Coding, debugging and testing
Build high-quality reusable code that can be used in the future
Develop functional and sustainable applications with clean codes
Collaborate with a multidisciplinary team of product owners, designers, developers and system administrators
Collaborate with the ModernMT and Research teams to create the best Translation Engine ever.
Requirements
Master degree in Computer Science or SW Engineering courses
3+ years of working experience
Proven experience in developing and maintaining scalable Machine Learning and AI services
Deep Knowledge of Python, Java and Bash
Experience with Kubernetes and Docker
Experience with Relational DBMS ( MySQL, PostgreSQL )
Experience with NoSQL DBMS ( Redis, MongoDB )
Experience with version control GIT and Github workflow
Proactive, self-driven and enjoys solving complex problems, not just in the primary area of responsibility but across boundaries.
Headquarter

Translated is hosted at Pi Campus, a working environment immersed in nature where 7 luxury villas have been converted into functional offices to foster talent growth. Pi Campus is also a venture firm created by Translated to reinvest part of its profits into promising AI startups.
Benefits and Perks
Gym
Swimming Pool
Kickboxing, TRX, and Pilates classes
Table Tennis and Football table
Kitchen and snacks
Bonuses and incentives for employees who quit smoking, ride a bicycle to work, or adopt a child.
Learn more about our company: https://translated.com/work-at-translated-onboarding.
Diversity statement

At Translated, we proudly embrace and celebrate each individual's unique qualities to our team, regardless of race, sexual orientation, gender identity, or any other differences. We recognize that these diverse perspectives empower us to overcome challenges, foster innovation, and drive excellence. As an inclusive and equal-opportunity employer, we are committed to cultivating an environment where everyone feels welcome, valued, and supported to achieve their full potential.

About Translated

Translated is a leading company in AI-enabled translation services. We are on a mission to allow everyone to understand and be understood in their own language.

Our success stems from a unique blend of the worldâ€™s #1 adaptive neural machine translation technology (IDC MarketScape 2022), the largest network of vetted, native-speaking professional translators, and top-ranked AI-enabled text, audio, and video translation tools (Gartner, 2022).

By leveraging a seamless symbiosis of artificial intelligence and human creativity, we design custom localization projects that were previously unthinkable, helping more than 280,000 clients grow their businesses worldwide.

Weâ€™re looking for a passionate Machine Learning Engineer to join the Translated Data Science and AI Production team in our HQ in Pi Campus, Rome. The persona will be responsible for building and maintaining the Machine Learning and AI services of the company.


Key responsabilities

  • Lead the development of Machine Learning services
  • Build and maintain CI/CD pipelines
  • Improve and maintain our GPU cluster
  • Improve and maintain our API ecosystem
  • Optimize and put in production Machine Learning models
  • Collaborate with other team members on internal and external models
  • Coding, debugging and testing

  • Develop functional and sustainable applications with clean codes
  • Collaborate with a multidisciplinary team of product owners, designers, developers and system administrators
  • Collaborate with the ModernMT and Research teams to create the best Translation Engine ever.


Requirements

  • Master degree in Computer Science or SW Engineering courses
  • 3+ years of working experience
  • Proven experience in developing and maintaining scalable Machine Learning and AI services
  • Deep Knowledge of Python, Java and Bash
  • Experience with Kubernetes and Docker
  • Experience with Relational DBMS ( MySQL, PostgreSQL )
  • Experience with NoSQL DBMS ( Redis, MongoDB )
  • Experience with version control GIT and Github workflow
  • Proactive, self-driven and enjoys solving complex problems, not just in the primary area of responsibility but across boundaries.


Headquarter

Translated is hosted at Pi Campus, a working environment immersed in nature where 7 luxury villas have been converted into functional offices to foster talent growth. Pi Campus is also a venture firm created by Translated to reinvest part of its profits into promising AI startups.


Benefits and Perks

  • Gym
  • Swimming Pool
  • Kickboxing, TRX, and Pilates classes
  • Table Tennis and Football table
  • Kitchen and snacks
  • Bonuses and incentives for employees who quit smoking, ride a bicycle to work, or adopt a child.

Learn more about our company: https://translated.com/work-at-translated-onboarding.


Diversity statement

At Translated, we proudly embrace and celebrate each individual's unique qualities to our team, regardless of race, sexual orientation, gender identity, or any other differences. We recognize that these diverse perspectives empower us to overcome challenges, foster innovation, and drive excellence. As an inclusive and equal-opportunity employer, we are committed to cultivating an environment where everyone feels welcome, valued, and supported to achieve their full potential.

Con piÃ¹ di 140.000 professionisti in oltre 50 Paesi in tutto il mondo, siamo protagonisti e acceleratori della trasformazione digitale offrendo ai nostri clienti soluzioni tecnologiche e innovative progettate su misura. Il motore di NTTDATA sono le persone, ognuna con la propria unicitÃ , talento ed attitudine. Abbiamo costruito una Smile Working Company in cui la cura, lâ€™ascolto delle persone, il loro benessere e sviluppo delle competenze sono la nostra prioritÃ . Abbiamo creato spazi di lavoro che favoriscono il senso di comunitÃ  e lo scambio costruttivo di esperienze.
Guardiamo al nostro domani con la stessa passione di ieri e abbiamo bisogno anche del tuo talento!
www.nttdata.com/it
Responsibilities

The ideal candidate as Senior Machine Learning Engineer in NTT DATA will have a solid Generative AI hands-on capability (preferably on Azure/GCP and on-premise GenAI architecture and MLops), mathematical background, experience working on a range of classification, informational retrieval, clustering, and optimization problems, establishing scalable, efficient, automated processes for large scale data analysis, model development, model validation and model implementation.

The Senior Machine Learning Engineer will work alongside experienced Data Scientists, Data and ML Engineers to identify business opportunities, design and create new data pipelines from scratch, from experiments to deploying them in production.
He/She will be responsible for multiple projects, leading the ML Engineers and connecting with the stakeholders.
Required Skills
At least 5 years of production experience working in Data Science or Software Engineering
Deep knowledge of math, probability, statistics and algorithms
At least 6/12 months of experience in Generative AI deployment and underlying architecture handling
Vector Database knowledge is well appreciated
Understanding of data structures, data modeling and software architecture
Fluent in a at least two mainstream programming language (Python, Scala, Java, C++)
Experience in building an infrastructure for technical users, such as Data Scientist, ML practitioners or data consumers/producers
Strong knowledge of Spark, Databricks is a strong plus
Experience developing/deploying ML solutions in one of the public cloud platforms and on a Cross-cloud base, Snowflake knowledge is a plus
Deep knowledge with machine learning frameworks (such as Keras or PyTorch)
Ability to design and implement machine learning pipelines in a production environment
Experience with deployment including knowledge of CI/CD, containerization, and related concepts with a focus over MLops/Re-Training/Drift Management
Ability to train more junior team members in multiple Machine Learning and Deep Learning concepts
Establish and maintain strong relationships with internal team members and external clients
Location: Milano, Bari, Bologna, Cosenza, Napoli, Pisa, Roma, Torino

4029283070,https://it.linkedin.com/jobs/view/ai-engineer-at-amaris-consulting-4029283070?position=21&pageNum=0&refId=6VwybPj3KxlwPhEdg0E3FQ%3D%3D&trackingId=N%2FmCVEngwVXn%2FcPVmMSUYQ%3D%3D&trk=public_jobs_jserp-result_search-card,AI engineer,Amaris Consulting,Greater Rome Metropolitan Area,"Who are we?

Amaris Consulting is an independent technology consulting firm providing guidance and solutions to businesses. With more than 1,000 clients across the globe, we have been rolling out solutions in major projects for over a decade â€“ this is made possible by an international team of 7,600 people spread across 5 continents and more than 60 countries. Our solutions focus on four different Business Lines: Information System & Digital, Telecom, Life Sciences and Engineering. Weâ€™re focused on building and nurturing a top talent community where all our team members can achieve their full potential. Amaris is your steppingstone to cross rivers of change, meet challenges and achieve all your projects with success.

At Amaris, we strive to provide our candidates with the best possible recruitment experience. We like to get to know our candidates, challenge them, and be able to give them proper feedback as quickly as possible. Here's what our recruitment process looks like:

Brief Call: Our process typically begins with a brief virtual/phone conversation to get to know you! The objective? Learn about you, understand your motivations, and make sure we have the right job for you!

Interviews (the average number of interviews is 3 - the number may vary depending on the level of seniority required for the position). During the interviews, you will meet people from our team: your line manager of course, but also other people related to your future role. We will talk in depth about you, your experience, and skills, but also about the position and what will be expected of you. Of course, you will also get to know Amaris: our culture, our roots, our teams, and your career opportunities!
Case study: Depending on the position, we may ask you to take a test. This could be a role play, a technical assessment, a problem-solving scenario, etc.

As you know, every person is different and so is every role in a company. That is why we have to adapt accordingly, and the process may differ slightly at times. However, please know that we always put ourselves in the candidate's shoes to ensure they have the best possible experience.
We look forward to meeting you!
Job Description
Join the Amaris Consulting talent network as AI Expert!
ğŸ‘‰ What will you do?

Algorithm Design: AI Engineers develop and optimize algorithms for machine learning (ML), deep learning (DL), and other AI techniques. This can involve designing neural networks, predictive models, and machine learning systems.

Data Analysis: A critical part of the job involves analyzing large datasets (Big Data) to identify patterns, trends, and valuable insights. This often requires the use of data mining techniques and data preprocessing.

AI Model Development: AI Engineers build, train, test, and optimize AI models using historical data. These models can be applied to various tasks, such as speech recognition, computer vision, behavior prediction, or automated decision-making.

Implementation and Deployment: Once models are developed, AI Engineers are responsible for integrating them into real-world applications. This includes ensuring that the models perform well in production environments and scaling them as needed.

Research and Innovation: Staying updated with the latest advancements in AI and continually experimenting with new techniques and tools is essential. AI Engineers often contribute to research and development, exploring novel approaches to improve AI capabilitities
âœï¸ What do we request?
Degree Requirements:
Bachelorâ€™s or Masterâ€™s degree in Computer Science, AI, Data Science, or a related field.
Hard Skills:
Proficiency in programming languages like Python, R, or Java.
Strong understanding of machine learning frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch).
Knowledge of data analysis, data preprocessing, and statistical modeling.
Experience with neural networks, natural language processing (NLP), or computer vision.
Familiarity with cloud computing and deployment tools (AWS, Docker, Kubernetes
âœ¨ What do we offer?
Work by objectives with quarterly monitoring.
Educational and technical growth path.
Inclusive work climate.
Lunch vouchers of â‚¬8 per working day.
Free access to Mantu Academy platform with more than 500 courses.
Psychological counselling.
ğŸ™Œ Our ideal candidate recognizes in these values:
Pioneer Spirit: desire to explore new technologies, ideas, and skills to build a more sustainable world.
Care: commitment to promoting diversity, meritocracy, and environmental protection for a better future.
Performance: constant ambition to achieve excellence through creativity, innovation, and technology.
Trust: trust is a pillar of progress, driving freedom, creativity, and innovation.
Independence: independence is the basis for realizing a prosperous and agile future.

Amaris Consulting is an industry-leading Top Employer 2024-certified company that supports its cross-sectors partners at 360 degrees on the software life cycle, providing solutions in different areas such as Strategy management, Data innovation, Business applications & Processes, Design & Development, Digital Workplace and Platform & Security.

Amaris Consulting is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace. We are committed to promoting diversity within the workforce and creating an inclusive working environment. For this purpose, we welcome applications from all qualified candidates regardless of gender, sexual orientation, race, ethnicity, beliefs, age, marital status, disability, or other characteristics.

3953133305,https://it.linkedin.com/jobs/view/artificial-intelligence-space-engineer-at-thales-3953133305?position=23&pageNum=0&refId=6VwybPj3KxlwPhEdg0E3FQ%3D%3D&trackingId=vYH%2F1Tx9tGOd5P%2FFASQFJA%3D%3D&trk=public_jobs_jserp-result_search-card,Artificial Intelligence Space Engineer,Thales,"Rome, Latium, Italy","A Joint Venture between Thales (67%) and Leonardo (33%), Thales Alenia Space is a global space manufacturer delivering, for more than 40 years, high-tech solutions for telecommunications, navigation, Earth Observation, environmental management, exploration, science and orbital infrastructures. Thanks to our diversity of skills, talents and cultures, our customers (governments, institutions, space agencies, telecommunications operators), therefore have Space to Connect, Secure & Defend, Observe & Protect, Explore, Travel & Navigate.
Artificial Intelligence Engineering
CANDIDATES THAT WOULD IMPRESS US
PROFILE:
You graduated from an Engineering School with a masterâ€™s degree â€“ a PhD is a plus

Your level of experience ranges from junior to advance: you are a student OR/AND you have already occupied one or more positions among the following: Algorithm or Software Engineer, Artificial Intelligence Engineer
You are curious and willing to stay abreast of the latest trends (technical, philosophical, ethical by design)
You enjoy thinking ""outside the box"" and use your creativity to address complex challenges
You are recognised as a team player and promote collaborative work
You are user centric and want to design components accordingly
COMPETENCIES:
You have in-depth knowledge in mathematics, algorithms, experiment plan, continuous iterations and Agility
You are proficient in one of the following Artificial Intelligence Approches:
Data driven AI, Symbolic AI, Hybrid AI on the Solution
Symbolic Artificial Intelligence and reasoning
Human/machine dialog
Systems Analysis
You understand the norms, laws and standards
You have knowledge of cybersecurity
You can confidently discuss with people from different jobs and background

You master foundational concepts in mathematics/ statistics science and their application to deploy them on Solution studies: statistical modelling, linear algebra, optimisation, machine learning Mathematics and Statistics
NICE TO HAVE:
Working heritage on major satellite Earth Observation and Navigation systems
Simulation by tool such as Matlab & Simulink
adopting modern Agile and DevOps processes
Knowledge of Data analysis and big data technologies
Knowledge of Cloud technologies and architectures
Knowledge of Edgetechnologies
Knowledge of object programming in particular Python (Pyorch) , Java, C ++ and relevant Data Science packages (such as numpy, scipy, scikit-learn, pandas...)
Good knowledge of operating systems
LIFE AS A THALES ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ENGINEERING ROLE
As an Artificial Intelligence Engineering Role within Thales, you will:
Design and develop trustworthy artificial intelligence components for various domains
Identify the right cutting-edge Artificial Intelligence technologies (machine learning, symbolic AI, dialogue) and develop the Artificial Intelligence component accordingly
Work on Natural Language Processing (NLP) and Understanding (NLU), and also to design multimodal approaches for Human-Machin Dialog including intention understanding, reasoning and hybrid AI
Work on Machine Learning, causality vs. correlation, and/or other Data driven AI technics such as Random Forest, Evolutionary Algorithms, â€¦
Work on Symbolic AI, Ontology, Semantic Web, Knowledge based Reasoning, Meta-heuristics, Problem Solving, Operations Research, Decision Making and reasoning
Propose and design approach alternatives
Integrate scientific method into engineering system methodology
Ensure data knowledge and traceability
Ensure continuous technowatch and be aware of the latest trends (technical, philosophical, ethical by design)

Define the system capabilities thanks to a functional, logical and value analysis, describing functions to be performed to meet the real needs of the user in the various scenarii and maximising product value for Customer
YOUR CAREER AT THALES
Future opportunities will allow you to discover other domains or sites. You will be able to evolve and grow your competences in different areas:
Room and attention to personal development
Build your talents in another domain of Thales Group, discovering new products, new customers, new country or go to a more complex Solution
Choose between a technical expertise or a leadership path
Build an international career within a leading Engineering Group

At Thales Alenia Space we provide CAREERS and not only jobs. With Thales Alenia Space employing around 8,900 employees in 10 countries with 17 sites in Europe and a plant in the US, our mobility policy enables employees each year to develop their careers at home and abroad. Thales Alenia Space sees space as a new horizon, helping to build a better, more sustainable life on Earth #SpaceForLife. Great journeys start here, apply now!

4017421053,https://it.linkedin.com/jobs/view/data-scientist-generative-ai-specialist-at-bip-4017421053?position=25&pageNum=0&refId=6VwybPj3KxlwPhEdg0E3FQ%3D%3D&trackingId=TRAEJlv7y%2FFBxK7n3Ia6fw%3D%3D&trk=public_jobs_jserp-result_search-card,Data Scientist - Generative AI Specialist,BIP,"Rome, Latium, Italy","
DATA SCIENTIST â€“ GENERATIVE AI SPECIALIST
Entra nel nostro mondo.
Trasforma insieme a noi.
Quale sarÃ  la tua sfida?

Bip ha creato allâ€™interno del proprio Competence Centre â€œxTechâ€ il piÃ¹ nutrito gruppo di Data Scientist in Italia (fonte: statistiche LinkedIn), e dallâ€™Italia coordina anche i propri gruppi di Data Scientist locali presso le proprie sedi estere.

Nellâ€™ambito della continua crescita ed evoluzione di questo effervescente gruppo, che opera sui nostri clienti in tutti i settori, e ci ha consentito di introdurre lâ€™Intelligenza Artificiale presso le realtÃ  enterprise piÃ¹ importanti dâ€™Italia, siamo alla ricerca sia di profili junior/intermediate (dai neolaureati a profili con almeno 2 anni di esperienza), sia profili middle-senior (dai 3 ai 6 anni di esperienza). La provenienza da societÃ  di consulenza direzionale o informatica sarÃ  considerata un forte plus.

Il/La Generative AI Specialist in Bip evolve non solo le proprie competenze nei modelli di Generative AI, ma anche la comprensione dei fenomeni legati al Business dei nostri Clienti e le proprie capacitÃ  di tradurli in soluzioni e poi di comunicare e utilizzare i risultati degli stessi per migliorare ed efficientare i processi.

I/Le nostri/e Generative AI Specialists verranno introdotti in contesti progettuali dove per la maggior parte i dati sono non strutturati (testi, immagini, video, suoni) e il cui focus diventa la comprensione, il processamento e la generazione partendo da tali basi documentali altrimenti non processabili con le classiche tecniche di Data Science.

I contesti progettuali spaziano dallâ€™utilizzo di modelli pre-addestrati (es. LLM) fino allâ€™addestramento di nuovi modelli di Generative AI passando dal fine-tuning e absorption learning da modelli commerciali.

Oltre alle progettualitÃ , ai/alle Generative AI Specialist sarÃ  richiesto un contributo attivo per alimentare la Community con attivitÃ  di ricerca, scouting, concept di nuove soluzioni e business development.
Sarai tu ad entrare nel nostro team?
Requisiti indispensabili:
Laurea Specialistica in Ingegneria Informatica, Ingegneria Matematica, Informatica, Statistica o discipline affini (STEM)
Forte approccio quantitativo e brillanti doti analitiche
Passione e competenza in ambito data exploration, analisi dati e creazione di modelli: il nostro team disegna e sviluppa sistemi a supporto di decisioni strategiche per il business
Competenze statistiche, di Data Mining, Machine Learning,Â Deep Learning
Solida conoscenza e comprovata esperienza in programmazione e scripting Python
Esperienza con strumenti di version control (es.Â Git)
Conoscenza approfondita di database relazionali e di costrutti SQL e SQL Programming
Conoscenza di database non relazionali (es.Â elasticsearch,Â mongodb,Â redis)
Conoscenza di database vettoriali (es. ChromaDB, QDrant, Pinecone, ...)
Conoscenza e lâ€™utilizzo di API Cloud di Intelligenza Artificiale di almeno uno tra i principali cloud provider (Google, Microsoft, AWS)
Conoscenza tecniche di processamentoÂ dati non strutturati
Conoscenza approfondita diÂ Natural Language Processing (NLP),Â Computer VisionÂ e relative tecniche (Text Categorization, Entity Extraction, Generation, Object Detection, Object Segmentation)
Esperienza su Reti Neurali,Â Convolutional Neural Network,Â Transformers
Conoscenza di tecniche di Generative AI e dei principaliÂ Large Language ModelsÂ (LLM)
Esperienza con tecniche di allenamento e fine-tuning di reti neurali (esempio: superconvergenza, PEFT, LORA, â€¦)
Conoscenza delle principali librerie di processamento dati non strutturati (tensorflow,Â torch,Â pytorch) e repository di modelli (huggingface)
Conoscenza delle principali tecniche di prompting (es. one/few-shot, chain-of-thought)
Indispensabile la conoscenza fluente di italiano e inglese professionali
Plus:
Conoscenza di strumenti di containerizzazione (Docker, Kubernetes, etc)
Esperienza nello sviluppo e applicazione di modelli di Generative AI in contesti industriali
Esperienza nello sviluppo software e conoscenza approfondita del ciclo di vita del software
Conoscenza di framework di versionamento di dati e/o modelliÂ (es., Â MLFlow, DVC)
Utilizzo di reti generative per la produzione controllata di contenuto (testo, immagini, video)
Sviluppo di Motori di Ricerca, Entity Extraction, Anomaly Detection su immagini
Conoscenza principali modelli di Explainable AI (SHAP, Lime, Anchors)
Esperienza con framework di lavoro AGILE (esempio: Scrum, Kanban).
Soft Skills:
Standing consulenziale
Ottime doti relazionali e comunicative
Orientamento al cliente e al raggiungimento degli obiettivi
Buona attitudine a lavorare in team
Precisione e stress tolerance nel rispetto delle scadenze
PerchÃ¨ Bip?
People atÂ theÂ center of our culture
Fiducia e collaborazione, imprenditorialitÃ  e coraggio, meritocrazia e sviluppo guidano la crescita delle nostre persone.
Lavorare in BIP Ã¨ un'esperienza sfidante, in cui il merito paga e l'innovazione avviene attraverso idee coraggiose, collaborazione e un rapporto di fiducia con i nostri clienti.Â
Challenge yourself

Avrai la possibilitÃ  di metterti alla prova in contesti progettuali diversi in termini di ambito, natura delle attivitÃ  e stakeholders coinvolti. Vedrai valorizzato il tuo spirito di iniziativa, la tua passione, lâ€™autonomia e la capacitÃ  di assumerti responsabilitÃ  e metterti in gioco.
Unlocking your potential
Potrai partecipare a + di 300 corsi formativi allâ€™avanguardia per accrescere le tue competenze su tecnologie e temi di business emergenti.
Work-life Integration
Troverai una policy che supporta lo smartworkingÂ fino al 100% del proprio tempo e favorisce il work-life integration.
Diversity, Equity & Inclusion
Valorizziamo lâ€™unicitÃ  e ci impegniamo a garantire che tutti abbiano pari opportunitÃ  di dare un contributo ed esprimere al massimo il potenziale nell'ambiente di lavoro.

Il nostro approccio alla diversitÃ  e allâ€™inclusione si fonda sui principi di etica e integritÃ  e rappresenta il fattore determinante per lo sviluppo di orizzonti, di crescita personale e aziendale, piÃ¹ ampi.
Promuoviamo lâ€™inserimento e lâ€™integrazione lavorativa delle persone appartenenti alle categorie protette â€“ in base a quanto disciplinato dalla legge 68/99 â€“.
Next Steps
Una volta ricevuto il tuo cv ci prendere
mo del tempo per valutarlo attentamente.
Se câ€™Ã¨ un match con questa o con altre posizioni aperte allâ€™interno del Gruppo, ti contatteremo per iniziare la nostra conoscenza reciproca.
Lâ€™iter di selezione comprende generalmente un colloquio con HR, un colloquio tecnico con un line manager ed un eventuale colloquio con un Partner.
Lâ€™ordine e il numero delle interviste potrebbero variare a seconda delle esigenze di recruiting.
In alternativa, saremo felici di conservare il tuo CV nel nostro database per poterlo rivalutare per altre opportunitÃ  future.
Se dovessi identificare ulteriori posizioni di tuo interesse ed in linea con il tuo profilo, aspettiamo la tua candidatura per poterla valutare nuovamente.
Su di Noi
Nati nel 2003, abbiamo raccolto e valorizzato lâ€™esperienza storica della consulenza e abbiamo aggiunto due ingredienti chiave: lâ€™innovazione e la digitalizzazione.

Grazie a questo percorso siamo oggi oltre 5000 professionisti e professioniste, presenti in 13 Paesi, con oltre 4500 progetti alle spalle e le conoscenze piÃ¹ allâ€™avanguardia nell'ambito della Digital Transformation, Data Science, Cybersecurity, Industry 4.0, IOT e di tutte le Disruptive Technologies che mettiamo a servizio di ogni settore di mercato.
Aiutiamo i nostri clienti a fare la differenza creando qualitÃ  su larga scala attraverso una formula che opera su tre leve: Valore, Persone e Tecnologia.

Crediamo nel valore dellâ€™eccellenza, che Ã¨ la bussola su cui orientiamo il nostro agire, e adottiamo un approccio etico e leale nei confronti di quante e quanti scelgono diÂ lavorare con noi, promuovendo un ambiente in cui le persone possano crescere insieme, grazie alla contaminazione tra competenze diverse.

  • Esperienza con framework di lavoro AGILE (esempio: Scrum, Kanban).


    • Soft Skills:
    • Standing consulenziale
    • Ottime doti relazionali e comunicative
    • Orientamento al cliente e al raggiungimento degli obiettivi
    • Buona attitudine a lavorare in team
    • Precisione e stress tolerance nel rispetto delle scadenze


    PerchÃ¨ Bip?

    People at
column29:
center of our culture

Fiducia e collaborazione, imprenditorialitÃ  e coraggio, meritocrazia e sviluppo guidano la crescita delle nostre persone.

Lavorare in BIP Ã¨ un'esperienza sfidante, in cui il merito paga e l'innovazione avviene attraverso idee coraggiose, collaborazione e un rapporto di fiducia con i nostri clienti.
column30:
Challenge yourself

Avrai la possibilitÃ  di metterti alla prova in contesti progettuali diversi in termini di ambito, natura delle attivitÃ  e stakeholders coinvolti. Vedrai valorizzato il tuo spirito di iniziativa, la tua passione, lâ€™autonomia e la capacitÃ  di assumerti responsabilitÃ  e metterti in gioco.

Unlocking your potential

Potrai partecipare a + di 300 corsi formativi allâ€™avanguardia per accrescere le tue competenze su tecnologie e temi di business emergenti.

Work-life Integration

Troverai una policy che supporta lo smartworking
column31:
fino al 100% del proprio tempo e favorisce il work-life integration.

Diversity, Equity &
column32:
Inclusion

Valorizziamo lâ€™unicitÃ  e ci impegniamo a garantire che tutti abbiano pari opportunitÃ  di dare un contributo ed esprimere al massimo il potenziale nell'ambiente di lavoro.

Il nostro approccio alla diversitÃ  e allâ€™inclusione si fonda sui principi di etica e integritÃ  e rappresenta il fattore determinante per lo sviluppo di orizzonti, di crescita personale e aziendale, piÃ¹ ampi.

Promuoviamo lâ€™inserimento e lâ€™integrazione lavorativa delle persone appartenenti alle categorie protette â€“ in base a quanto disciplinato dalla legge 68/99 â€“.

Next Steps

Una volta ricevuto il tuo cv ci prendere
mo del tempo per valutarlo attentamente.

Se câ€™Ã¨ un match con questa o con altre posizioni aperte allâ€™interno del Gruppo, ti contatteremo per iniziare la nostra conoscenza reciproca.

Lâ€™iter di selezione comprende generalmente un colloquio con HR, un colloquio tecnico con un line manager ed un eventuale colloquio con un Partner.

Lâ€™ordine e il numero delle interviste potrebbero variare a seconda delle esigenze di recruiting.

In alternativa, saremo felici di conservare il tuo CV nel nostro database per poterlo rivalutare per altre opportunitÃ  future.

Se dovessi identificare ulteriori posizioni di tuo interesse ed in linea con il tuo profilo, aspettiamo la tua candidatura per poterla valutare nuovamente.

Su di Noi

Nati nel 2003, abbiamo raccolto e valorizzato lâ€™esperienza storica della consulenza e abbiamo aggiunto due ingredienti chiave: lâ€™innovazione e la digitalizzazione.

Grazie a questo percorso siamo oggi oltre 5000 professionisti e professioniste, presenti in 13 Paesi, con oltre 4500 progetti alle spalle e le conoscenze piÃ¹ allâ€™avanguardia nell'ambito della Digital Transformation, Data Science, Cybersecurity, Industry 4.0, IOT e di tutte le Disruptive Technologies che mettiamo a servizio di ogni settore di mercato.

Aiutiamo i nostri clienti a fare la differenza creando qualitÃ  su larga scala attraverso una formula che opera su tre leve: Valore, Persone e Tecnologia.

Crediamo nel valore dellâ€™eccellenza, che Ã¨ la bussola su cui orientiamo il nostro agire, e adottiamo un approccio etico e leale nei confronti di quante e quanti scelgono di
column33: lavorare con noi, promuovendo un ambiente in cui le persone possano crescere insieme, grazie alla contaminazione tra competenze diverse.
